channel.description: Recent content in tech on me.shew.io

item.title: Hello World
item.description: After writing this site for ages, I’ve finally plopped down and hashed it out in a few days, neglecting to do much of anything else in the process. As of right now, the site’s pretty simple – not as lean as I’d like it, but it gets the job done. I’ve still got to finish up the summary and resume page of the site which will require me dusting off my resume and thinking hard about what it is I want this site to expose about me.
